metadata.title: DRIEQUIP Youth Moisture Wicking UV Protection T-Shirt in Sizes Youth XS-XL
features: Dri-Equip Youth Moisture Wicking UV Protection T-Shirt
3.8 oz./yd² / 130 gsm, 100% polyester interlock with moisture-wicking and UV protection performance
Cationic dyes to ensure superior brightness and excellent color fastness
In Youth Sizes: X-Small (4-5), Small (6-8), Medium (10-12), Large (14-16), X-Large (18-20)
description: DRI-EQUIP Youth Moisture Wicking UV Protection T-Shirt Printed with DRI-EQUIP Logo Inside. 3.8 oz./yd² / 130 gsm, 100% polyester interlock with moisture-wicking and UV protection performance. Team fit. Heat-sealed label. Cationic dyes to ensure superior brightness and excellent color fastness.
